channel.title: Comments on: WRITE UP – Facebook bug bounty: “Getting access to prompt debug dialog and serialized tool on main website facebook.com”

item.title: By: Seismic Retrofit
item.dc:creator: Seismic Retrofit
item.description: Hey, I think yourr website might be having browser compatibility issues. When I look at your blog site in Opera, it looks fine but when opning in Intesrnet Explorer, it hass some overlapping. I just wanted to give yoou a quick heads up! Other then that, excellent blog!
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I think yourr website might be having browser compatibility issues.
When I look at your blog site in Opera, it looks fine but when opning in Intesrnet Explorer,
it hass some overlapping. I just wanted to give yoou a quick heads up!
Other then that, excellent blog!

item.title: By: omespino

item.description: Thanks for your enthusiasm , for sure my plan is update more often the blog
item.content:encoded: Thanks for your enthusiasm , for sure my plan is update more often the blog
